page.title: 04Boys' Fashion
page.content:
People like me and my friends wear things like baggy jeans that have zips all over them and jumpers with patterns. We like jackets with flaps, leather training shoes and shirts that look as if paint has spilt all over them. We wear different coloured socks and slip-on shoes which are pointed at the front.
Our hair is short. Long hair used to be in fashion but it is not anymore. Only hippies have long hair, they wear jeans or cords which are tight at the top and wide at the bottom. Me and my friends wouldn't be seen dead looking like that.
